title: NASA’s new telescope is a game-changer
description:
Decades ago, the Hubble telescope revolutionized NASA’s ability to visualize space. Soon, the new James Webb telescope will take us even further. Vox’s Unexplainable explores the endless possibilities of NASA’s new spyglass. 

References: 
Listen to the full episode here
